title: Porcini pizza
ingredients: ['1.13kg bread flour', '30g salt', '1 tablespoon honey', '600ml warm water', '1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '225g rehydrated porcini mushrooms', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons dry polenta', '110g grated Fontina cheese', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
